title: Log the location of build task DLLs
body: I'm having trouble with some incompatible packages that each brings their own build extensions as a compiled DLL and I can't find logs that would show where these DLLs are actually loaded from

nodes.body: The "easiest" way to see this information currently is using the [assembly log viewer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/fuslogvw-exe-assembly-binding-log-viewer) (`fuslogvw.exe`).
